company.tagline: Leading Data and AI Platform for Enterprises
company.description: Databricks is the data and AI company. With the Data Intelligence Platform, Databricks democratizes insights to everyone in an organization. Built on an open lakehouse architecture, the platform provides a unified foundation for all data and governance, combined with AI models tuned to an organization’s unique characteristics.

funding_rounds.source: About Databricks: The data and AI company | Databricks

events.title: Native OpenAI Models Now Generally Available on Databricks
events.description: Databricks announces the general availability of native OpenAI models.

events.description: Databricks introduces Google’s Gemini models integrated into their platform.

events.description: General availability announcement for the Python Data Source API added to Databricks.

events.description: Launch of MLflow System Tables for data analysis across experiments.

events.description: Discussion on how 100+ customers are transforming business with Databricks and Palantir.
